title: Lojistik Planlama Uzmanı
description:
Bir teknolojisi firması olarak faaliyet gösterdiğimiz tüm pazarlarda lider olmak vizyonuyla çıktığımız yolda bize katılmak ister misiniz?

Kurumsalın alışılagelmiş ifadelerinden ve hiyerarşiden uzak heyecan verici bir kariyere başlamak için en iyi yönlerini ortaya çıkarmaya hazır, dinamik, entelektüel açıdan meraklı genç profesyoneller arıyoruz. Hızla büyümeye devam eden bir teknoloji şirketi olarak gerçek hayatta yaşanan sorunları çözme ve profesyonel yaşamı deneyimleme imkanı sunuyoruz. Yaptığın işin tüm sorumluluğunu almak istiyorsan, işine katkı sağlayacak yeni fikirlerin olduğunda sesini duyurmak istiyorsan ve olağanüstü bir işbaşında eğitim deneyimi yaşamaya hazırsan; o zaman meydan okumaya hazırsın. Bu heyecana ortak olup başarımızı daha da ileriye taşıyacak Lojistik Planlama Uzmanı arıyoruz.

🎯 Sorumluluklar

  • Malzemelerin ve ürünlerin organizasyondaki verimliliği için lojistik planlarının geliştirilmesi ve yürütülmesi
  • Lojistik stratejilerini iş hedefleri ile uyumlu hale getirmek için; satın alma, depo, nakliye ve satış dahil olmak üzere farklı ekiplerle işbirliği yapılması
  • Lojistik ihtiyaçlarının doğru bir şekilde tahmin edilmesi için envanter seviyelerinin, talep modellerinin ve üretim programlarının analiz edilmesi
  • Teslimat zaman çizelgeleri ve müşteri beklentileri karşılanırken maliyet etkinliğinin sağlanması için nakliye rotalarının ve taşıyıcı seçiminin optimize edilmesi
  • Lojistik fonksiyonu içinde süreç iyileştirme alanlarının belirlenmesi ve verimliliğin arttırılması, maliyetin düşürülmesi ve müşteri memnuniyetinin sağlanması için çözümler önerilmesi
  • Müşteriler ve satıcılar için teslimat süreçlerindeki sorunların takip edilmesi ve çözülmesi
  • Teslimat deneyimini iyileştirmek için 3PL iş ortaklarının yönlendirilmesi ve koordine edilmesi
  • Teslimat KPI’larının günlük olarak analiz edilmesi ve hataların ortadan kaldırılması için 3PL iş ortaklarının performansının takip edilmesi
  • Teslimatla ilgili müşteri ve satıcı şikayetlerinin analiz edilmesi, sorunlu noktaların tespit edilmesi ve işbirlikçi bir yaklaşımla aksiyonların alınması
  • Lojistik operasyonlarının performans ölçümü ve sürekli gelişim için KPI raporlarının yönetime sunulması
  • Stok doğruluğunun oluşması için, malzemelerin sistemsel giriş ve çıkışların zamanında tamamlanmasının sağlanması
  • Bayiler ile teslimat iletişimlerinin kurulması, sisteme lojistik ile ilgili duyuruların yüklenmesi
  • Haftalık sevk ve rota planlarının oluşturulması
  • Lojistik firmaları ile rota planlarına uygun olarak haftalık araç tedariğinin görüşülmesi ve araçların takip edilmesi
  • Çiçek arabası, rafı, çiçek kovası, palet gibi depolar ve tedarikçiler arasında hareket gören sabit kıymetlerin takip edilmesi ve kontrolünün sağlanması
  • Operasyon alanında kullanılan sarf malzeme (koli-bant-pelür kağıt) ihtiyaçları için Satın Alma Siparişi (SAS) oluşturulması, SASların tedarikçilere iletilmesi, olası sorunlarda tedarikçiler ile görüşülmesi ve gelen ürünlerin mal kabul işlemlerinin yapılması
  • Depoya ulaşan ve depodan çıkan araçların sıcaklık takibinin yapılması ve takip raporlarının oluşturulması
  • Sevkiyat süreçlerinin tamamlanmasının ardından ilgili lojistik firmaları ile mutabakat süreçlerinin tamamlanıp faturaların sisteme girişi ve rapor haline getirilmesi

    ✨Aranan Nitelikler

  • Önlisans ya da lisans bölümlerinden mezun
  • İlgili alanda en az 2 yıl tecrübeye sahip
  • MS Office programlarına hakim
  • Analiz, raporlama, zaman yönetimi becerilerine sahip ve iş takibi kuvvetli

About the Role

As a Graphic Designer, you will play a crucial role in enhancing CoverGo's visual identity and driving creative initiatives across various platforms. Your core responsibilities will include designing visually appealing graphics such as website banners, social media posts, and infographics while collaborating closely with the marketing team to deliver innovative solutions. What We Need

  • At least 2-3 years of experience in graphic design 
  • At least 1 year of experience in a creative or design agency
  • Proficient in graphic design software such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, Canva, and InDesign
  • Proficient in Google Slides/Powerpoint
  • Excellent attention to detail and ability to present ideas to the team
  • Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment
  • Strong verbal and written communication skills
  • Knowledge of motion graphics and video editing tools is a plus
  • Must be physically based in the Philippines

Why You'll Love Working Here

  • Fully Remote
  • Flexible Leave
  • International Environment
  • Competitive renumeration package
  • Performance Bonus
  • Stock Options after 6 months

  • Learning and development plan
  • Remote work allowance

title: Content Manager
description:
The team

At Interprefy, our Marketing department is compact but mighty, embodying collaboration, creativity, and innovation in everything we do. We embrace a fully remote working model, allowing us to operate efficiently across different locations while staying connected and aligned.

We are at the forefront of marketing trends and technologies, always experimenting with new approaches to keep our strategies agile and innovative in a fast-paced industry. Our team's adaptability allows us to embrace change as an opportunity for growth and learning.

Even though we work remotely, we foster a vibrant and inclusive culture, ensuring regular communication, knowledge-sharing, and support. Through virtual meetings and open channels, we stay connected, celebrate successes, and thrive as a cohesive, collaborative team.
The Role- key responsibilities

Job Overview:
 
As the Content Manager, you will be responsible for both strategizing and executing content initiatives that align with Interprefy's business objectives. This role requires a blend of strategic thinking, hands-on content creation, and project management to ensure the delivery of high-quality content across multiple channels. You will collaborate with various teams to drive engagement, increase brand visibility, and support business growth. 

Key Responsibilities:
 
1. Strategy and Planning: 
  • In partnership with the Marketing Team develop and execute a global content strategy aligned with business goals, driving engagement and supporting lead generation efforts. 
  • Work closely with marketing, product, and sales teams to ensure content initiatives are aligned with broader business goals and campaigns. 
  • Maintain and manage the content calendar, ensuring the timely execution of content that supports product launches, campaigns, and brand-building efforts. 
2. Content Creation and Execution: 
  • Execute content initiatives by directly producing high-quality content, including blogs, social media posts, case studies, customer success stories, email campaigns, landing pages, and more. 
  • Ensure consistency in tone, style, and messaging across all channels, maintaining a strong and coherent brand voice. 
  • Write critical and important content that requires expertise, edit, and optimize content for SEO to maximize organic traffic and improve search visibility. 
  • Oversee and control all internal and external content produced by the content team 
  • Collaborate with copywriters, designers, and external partners to deliver multimedia content that aligns with Interprefy’s branding and business objectives. 
  • Adapt content strategies based on audience insights and feedback, continuously refining execution to improve performance. 
3. Cross-Functional Collaboration: 
  • Work closely with the product, marketing, and sales teams to create content that supports key initiatives such as product launches, lead generation, and customer engagement. 
  • Ensure that content execution aligns with go-to-market strategies and supports campaigns across various channels. 
4. Content Performance and Optimization: 
  • Track and analyze content performance metrics, such as engagement, traffic, and conversion rates, to assess effectiveness and inform future strategies. 
  • Continuously optimize content based on performance insights, ensuring that it meets engagement and conversion goals. 
5. Workflow and Project Management: 
  • Manage content workflows and timelines to ensure timely delivery of high-quality content. 
  • Oversee content production, working with internal and external stakeholders to meet deadlines and quality standards. 
6. Manage relationships with external PR agencies: 
  • Coordinating efforts to align public relations initiatives with the overall content and brand strategy. 
  • Oversee the development of press releases, media kits, and other PR-related content, ensuring consistency in messaging and maximizing media exposure for key initiatives.
Key experiences and competencies

  • Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, Journalism, or a related field.
  • 4-6 years of experience in content marketing, with proven experience in both content strategy and hands-on content creation.
  • Strong writing and editing skills with attention to detail and consistency.
  • Proven experience with SEO, content optimization, and analytics tools.
  • Ability to execute content projects end-to-end, from ideation to publication.
  • Familiarity with content management systems (CMS) and marketing automation platforms.
  • Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and deliver high-quality results under tight deadlines.

title: LEAD RESEARCH TEAM LEADER (Work from Anywhere in the world)
description:
Wishpond Technologies currently has the position of Lead Research Team Leader available, and we’re excited to tell you about it!
 
OVERVIEW
We are searching for a Lead Research Team Leader to join our growing team on a full-time basis. This is a fully remote position, and the successful individual could be based anywhere in the world. You will work with an amazing remote team servicing and building relationships with clients based in the US and Canada. As a Lead Research Team Leader, you will oversee the database research, collection, and quality control process. In collaboration with the entire Team, the Lead Research Team Leader is responsible for the success of Wishpond Technologies.

RESPONSIBILITIES  
• Optimize and control the database research and lead the collection process.
• Supervise a team of internal researchers to meet the company’s standards and targets.
• Validate and QC databases on a daily basis.
• Administer databases for a variety of industries and brands.
• Maintain logs and reports of data collection criteria, processes, and KPIs.
• Ensure the data research and collection process is scalable and repeatable.
• Process databases for email verification.
• Supervise and conduct professional social network research.
• Collaborate with and support the SDR and Email Deliverability teams.
• Provide daily updates on staff performance and project progress.
• Other duties as assigned.

QUALIFICATIONS
• Minimum of 2 years experience in an administrative or database research role.
• Minimum of 2 years experience supervising staff.
• Experience with an unstructured and fast-paced startup environment is an asset.
• Self-motivated with the ability to establish goals and reach them.
• As part of a diverse team, the ability to work both independently and collaboratively.
• Must be a problem solver and results-driven.
• Must be tech-savvy.
• Organized, administratively strong.
• Fluent in English (spoken and written).
• Willing to participate in ongoing education and training for the role.
• Intermediate to advanced Word, PowerPoint and Excel Skills.

WORK ENVIRONMENT
• It is expected that the successful candidate will provide their own workstation, computer, and headset and have a fast and reliable internet connection. Certain roles will be required to utilize and or download company-approved software.
• The individual must be prepared to work standard business hours on EST or PST
• Due to the nature of this role, we may verify backgrounds, including conducting employment references, criminal record, and credit checks.
• Once hired, the successful candidate must provide a valid government-issued photo ID and proof of residential address as part of their onboarding process.

GREAT REASONS TO JOIN OUR TEAM!
• Fully remote position allowing you to work from your home anywhere in the world!
• Exciting and dynamic environment with a great leadership team 
• Comprehensive training program and regular performance reviews to facilitate your success
• Competitive compensation based on experience and proven abilities
• Great referral programs with incentives and bonuses
• Unbelievable product discounts when you use our products for your own business
• A global workforce of multi-cultural and talented colleagues 
• A close-knit operation with amazing growth opportunities for your personal development
• A high growth SaaS technology company publicly traded on the TSX Venture Exchange
• Corporate headquarters in beautiful Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada
• Access to our education credits program and so much more !

ABOUT US
Founded in 2009, Wishpond is a rapidly growing technology company providing digital marketing solutions targeted at small businesses.  The cloud-based platform includes landing pages, social promotions, website pop-ups, online forms, and lead activity tracking. Wishpond has a dedicated team of professional project managers, designers, copywriters, and developers who provide marketing services tailored to our individual clients.
 
Wishpond serves over 3,000 customers in various industries and sizes, from startups to large Fortune 500 companies. Wishpond has a rapidly growing global headcount and continues to hire dedicated and qualified employees and contractors who have what it takes to scale a successful software company.

To learn more about Wishpond Technologies, please visit our website or any of our social media platforms:

• Website: www.wishpond.com
• Instagram: @wishpondofficial
• Twitter: Wishpond
• Youtube: Thewishpond
• LinkedIn: Wishpond

APPLICATION PROCESS
If you are interested in applying for this exciting opportunity, please provide an updated resume in English (PDF or Word formats only), quoting the position title in the subject line of your cover letter.
  
Wishpond Technologies is an equal-opportunity employer committed to hiring a diverse workforce and sustaining an inclusive culture that does not discriminate on the basis of disability, status, or any other basis protected under legislation
 
We thank all applicants in advance for their interest in this position; however, due to the volume of applications we receive, we are unable to respond to phone, email, or agency inquiries.

 INTERNAL APPLICATIONS CLOSE AT NOON PT, NEXT FRIDAY SEPTEMBER 27TH, 2024. AND BOTH AN UPDATED RESUME AND COVER LETTER EXPRESSING INTEREST IN THE POSITION ARE REQUIRED.
